subject: Hockey, Ice
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Iya Gavrilova scored two goals in the third period to lead Russia to a 5-3 win against China at the world women’s championship in Harbin, China. Russia improved to 1-1 in Pool A. Canada, the United States, Sweden and Finland have already qualified for the Vancouver Olympics in 2010. Two more countries will qualify for Vancouver out of the tournament. It is a tight race among Switzerland, Germany, Russia and China.
